title: [Testing][AR-May]: Testing effort of BuildCheck
body:
### Issue Description

### Summary

Testing effort of BuildCheck item for team member
 
## Part 1
- [x] Inbox (built-in) analyzers that run during the build execution.
- [ ] Custom BuilcCheck
- [x] Configuration
- [ ] Tracing
- [x] Replay mode

## Part 2
Repository to be tested: 
- [x] [OrchardCore](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore)
- [ ] PerfStar

For more information on the effort please refer to the related issue #10372.

nodes.body: Built-in analyzers: Tried on a devbox the rebuild OC solution. It hangs on solution clean stage of the second build with analyzers consistently. Not repro with console app, not repro on a laptop. Switching to one process `/m:1` also removes the issue.
Update: reproduced on the laptop as well. Filed a bug: #10414
Found a weird behavior of analyzer: #10431
I am having problems finding info for custom analyzers creation. Filed an issue to improve the experience: #10449
